name: Bacon and Egg Pocket
author: Heinz
summary: Bacon & egg pocket: Breakfast favourites come together in this quick and easy wrap - perfect for breakfast or lunch on the go!
directions: Whisk the eggs with the salt and pepper, reserve
Heat a large, nonstick skillet over medium heat
Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until onions and bacon are browned
Cook, stirring, for 1 to 2 minutes or until just set
Use a small knife to cut halfway around the outside edge of each pita, fold back the top flap
Spread an equal amount of the ketchup all over the inside of each pita
Lay a portion of spinach over the ketchup
Top with a portion of the scrambled egg mixture, sprinkle with cheese
Tuck the top flap of each pita inside, directly over the filling
Tightly roll the loose flap over the outside of each pita to completely enclose filling
Let stand for 5 minutes to soften cheese before serving
